summary: The class encapsulates all configurable parameters for IBM Watsonx AI text‑generation models, such as decoding method, temperature, token limits, penalties, stop sequences, moderation controls and streaming options. It stores these settings, validates them, and offers utilities to retrieve region lists, map OpenAI‑style parameters to Watsonx equivalents, and handle special authentication mappings.
business_intent: Provide a unified, programmatic way for applications to set up, translate, and manage Watsonx AI text generation options, ensuring correct regional endpoint selection and seamless interoperability with OpenAI‑style APIs.
